ygData.subject: Re: LvL 20-24
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Curtis. Ok, do you play on veeshan?  If not lemme give you a quick history of unrest ... I first started playing this game in may, I didn t find a
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Curtis.
Ok, do you play on veeshan? If not lemme give you a quick history of unrest
:)
I first started playing this game in may, I didn't find a character I liked
until around amonth later. I settled on a Gnome Warrior and played him till
lvl 24. Now, during my stint in unrest (lvl 16-23) It was a VERY popular
place. There could be upwards of 115 ppl in there at the same time.
Basically, 'safety in numbers'. Now that I'm high enough lvl to actually go
there with my cleric, there's avg. about 30 ppl there. Take 15 or so off
becaus they are lvl 30+, and your left with around 15 ppl for a group.. Now,
14 of these are first time players, and there's me left. Now I have found a
group before, but left immediatly because I couldn't talk any sense into
them. They insisted on pulling from certain places in the first floor, and
pulling from the second floor. BIG MISTAKE
Pulling from the second floor (when no one is camping it) usually brings the
ENTIRE second floor to you. (then what do they do? run right towards the
group, instant death almost) Pulling from certain areas in the first floor,
pulls the ENTIRE floor.
So I left because I didn't want to continuasly die.
Oh and I try to stay away from soloing non dead because the delay on smite is
so long.
Where are these Undead Reavers you speak of in East Karana?

Evertorn
Server: Veeshan

Curtis Bennett wrote:

> From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> I'm 18th level, but I certainly hope I don't have this problem when I
> get to level 20! I would think that groups would still want 20th
> level clerics if for no other reason than for Daring and Spirit Armor!
> Admittedly, I'm a little jealous that Druids at 19th get the same heal
> spell I do, so why get a cleric, when the Druid serves the same
> purpose at this level. I kinda bothered me.
> I suspect you can solo with some success (or get some cleric friends
> together) the undead reavers in East Karana, or you might still can
> get xp (albeit probably not much) from scarecrows in WK. I would
> still think Unrest would want clerics, or start your own group! You
> might try Mistmoore, although 20 may be too low for that place, I
> don't know. You could probably solo crag spiders and gorge hounds
> in EK, too. You might try to get a group at the pickclaws in HH, too.
> Hmm, beyond that, I don't know.
>
> Good luck!
>
> >From: EvertorN <evertorn@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] LvL 20-24
> >Date: Thu, 14 Oct 1999 15:24:43 -0700
> >
> >Hi all. I'd like to give props out to you all, and everyone on the
> >eq-cleric forum at stratic. (if any of you do both of these)
> >So far that forum and this list is easily, from what i've seen, most of
> >the maturist ppl in this game..mind you, there are always exceptions.
> >Well anyways, I've run into real life head on, and basically my playing
> >time has become very short, to almost non existant.. :(
> >I'm currently lvl 20, and am finding myself getting somewhat
> >frustrated. I have a few wizards in the group of ppl that I play with
> >(all higher lvl though) and I am able to occasinoally go to multiple
> >zones. I'm having an extremely tough time finding a group. Now, I know
> >my name has not been tarnished, unless it's been by an adolescent, so I
> >rule that case out. My friends say this is a tough time for a cleric to
> >find groups because our heal spell isn't that effective (which I
> >agree). But, being the poor melee'ers we are, I can't solo (one
> >exception..If I can do 2 things..1) find undead available to kill 2)
> >root holds).
> >I've been to unrest, lake rathe, oasis, bird citie (south karana? or
> >north..can't remember), perma, and basically I never get tells back from
> >anyone. Now one thing I've noticed is that the number of clerics has
> >risen, and groups will often tell me, 'sorry, we already have a
> >cleric'. And I'm not sure why they wouldn't want another one! Oh well,
> >I throw that away assuming they are playing their first character.
> >Anyways, I was basically just looking for a place to hunt and that I can
> >easily get a group. It sucks when you might have 2 hours to play a
> >week, and you spend 1 hour advertising for a group...
> >Or is it possibly I'm going to have to do my best to find a place to
> >solo undead for 4 levels?
> >
> >Any and all help would be appreciated.
> >TIA
> >
> >Evertorn
> >20th lvl erudite cleric
> >Veeshan
> >
> ><< text3.html >>
>
>
